item.title: NPC Teleport not working.. [562]
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Hi,

I’m trying to get my NPC to teleport to a place but i keep geting codes wrong. I use this code can someone tell me if it is right or not and correct it?

The place i want the npc teleporting the player is King Black Dragon and this is the coords… X:2273 Y:4680 Z:0

if(npc.getId() == 6390) { npc.getLocation(),getX(2273); npc.getLocation(),getY(4680); }

Thanks.
